robots_txt.recommendation: The robots.txt file exists in the production environment but is not found in the source code. It appears to be generated at build time or by the hosting platform. Consider adding explicit configuration for robots.txt in the source code for better control and version tracking.

sitemap_xml.recommendation: The sitemap.xml file exists in the production environment but is not found in the source code. It appears to be generated at build time or by the hosting platform. Consider adding explicit configuration for sitemap.xml in the source code for better control and version tracking.
